channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-3991] Karaf container doesn't respect Camel's DefaultShutdownStrategy timeout
item.description:
When shutting down a Fuse 6.1 or 6.2 standalone container with a pending Camel route, Karaf forcefully shuts down the container after 20 seconds.

Test route:

<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
 
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
 
                           http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring/camel-spring.xsd">
 
 
 
	<bean id="forced" class="java.lang.IllegalArgumentException">
 
   		<constructor-arg index="0" value="This is forced"/>
 
	</bean>
 
	
	<bean id="shutdown" class="org.apache.camel.impl.DefaultShutdownStrategy">     
		<property name="timeout" value="30"></property> 
	</bean> 
 
 
	<camelContext xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring">
 
		<onException>
 
			<exception>java.lang.Exception</exception>
 
			<redeliveryPolicy redeliveryDelay="1000" maximumRedeliveries="8" useExponentialBackOff="true" backOffMultiplier="2" logRetryAttempted="true" retryAttemptedLogLevel="WARN" maximumRedeliveryDelay="20000"/>            
			<handled>                
				<constant>true</constant>           
			</handled>
 
			<log message="Exception caught ${exception.stacktrace}" loggingLevel="ERROR"/>
 
			<to uri="file:/tmp/shutdown/exceptionHandled"/>
 
		</onException>
 
		
		<route>
 
			<from uri="file:/tmp/shutdown/input/?move=done/${file:onlyname}_${exchangeId}.${date:now:yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssSSS}&moveFailed=error/${file:onlyname}_${exchangeId}.${date:now:yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssSSS}"/>
 
			<log message="Throwing exception..."/>
 
			<throwException ref="forced"/>
 
		</route>
 
	</camelContext>
 
</beans>

Log excerpt:

16:35:36,411 | INFO  | Timer-1          | OsgiBundleXmlApplicationContext  | 121 - org.apache.servicemix.bundles.spring-context - 3.2.12.RELEASE_1 | Closing OsgiBundleXmlApplicationContext(bundle=01504759-routes.xml, config=osgibundle:/META-INF/spring/*.xml): startup date [Fri Sep 11 16:35:11 BST 2015]; root of context hierarchy
 
16:35:36,412 | INFO  | Timer-1          | DefaultListableBeanFactory       | 124 - org.apache.servicemix.bundles.spring-beans - 3.2.12.RELEASE_1 | Destroying singletons in org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory@1a7ab99c: defining beans [forced,template,consumerTemplate,camel-1:beanPostProcessor,camel-1]; root of factory hierarchy
 
16:35:36,412 | INFO  | Timer-1          | OsgiSpringCamelContext           | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Apache Camel 2.12.0.redhat-611433 (CamelContext: camel-1) is shutting down
 
16:35:36,414 | INFO  | Timer-1          | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Starting to graceful shutdown 1 routes (timeout 300 seconds)
 
16:35:36,416 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 300 seconds.
 
16:35:37,416 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 299 seconds.
 
16:35:38,417 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 298 seconds.
 
16:35:39,418 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 297 seconds.
 
16:35:40,418 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 296 seconds.
 
16:35:41,419 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 295 seconds.
 
16:35:42,419 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 294 seconds.
 
16:35:43,420 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 293 seconds.
 
16:35:43,470 | WARN  | /shutdown/input/ | DefaultErrorHandler              | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Failed delivery for (MessageId: ID-peterp-usersys-redhat-com-46509-1441985712394-0-1 on ExchangeId: ID-peterp-usersys-redhat-com-46509-1441985712394-0-2). On delivery attempt: 4 caught: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: This is forced
 
16:35:44,421 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 292 seconds.
 
16:35:45,421 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 291 seconds.
 
16:35:46,410 | ERROR | FelixShutdown    | RunnableTimedExecution           | 145 - org.springframework.osgi.extender - 1.2.1 | Closing runnable for context OsgiBundleXmlApplicationContext(bundle=01504759-routes.xml, config=osgibundle:/META-INF/spring/*.xml) did not finish in 10000ms; consider taking a snapshot and then shutdown the VM in case the thread still hangs

16:35:54,427 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 282 seconds.
 
16:35:55,427 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Waiting as there are still 2 inflight and pending exchanges to complete, timeout in 281 seconds.
 
16:35:56,413 | WARN  | FelixShutdown    | ExtenderConfiguration            | 145 - org.springframework.osgi.extender - 1.2.1 | Forcing the (internally created) taskExecutor to stop...
 
16:35:56,414 | INFO  | FelixShutdown    | TimerTaskExecutor                | 121 - org.apache.servicemix.bundles.spring-context - 3.2.12.RELEASE_1 | Cancelling Timer
 
16:35:56,416 | WARN  | /shutdown/input/ | GenericFileOnCompletion          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Rollback file strategy: org.apache.camel.component.file.strategy.GenericFileRenameProcessStrategy@13a82dfb for file: GenericFile[/tmp/shutdown/input/asd.txt]

16:35:56,431 | INFO  | 2 - ShutdownTask | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Route: route1 shutdown complete, was consuming from: Endpoint[file:///tmp/shutdown/input/?move=done%2F%24%7Bfile%3Aonlyname%7D_%24%7BexchangeId%7D.%24%7Bdate%3Anow%3AyyyyMMdd%27T%27HHmmssSSS%7D&moveFailed=error%2F%24%7Bfile%3Aonlyname%7D_%24%7BexchangeId%7D.%24%7Bdate%3Anow%3AyyyyMMdd%27T%27HHmmssSSS%7D]
 
16:35:56,432 | INFO  | Timer-1          | DefaultShutdownStrategy          | 142 - org.apache.camel.camel-core - 2.12.0.redhat-611433 | Graceful shutdown of 1 routes completed in 20 seconds
item.summary: Karaf container doesn't respect Camel's DefaultShutdownStrategy timeout

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: There is an example of how to use Spring DM shutdown wait time in ENTESB-3710.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
1. Copy the XML snippet into $FUSE_HOME/deploy
  2. Add a file to /tmp/shutdown/input/ to activate the route
  3. Shutdown the container using `osgi:shutdown`
  4. Observe log files
